entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Temiskaming Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:23 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Earlton Airport 6:00 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 1.4°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 41 %
Dewpoint: -10.5°C
Wind: S 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries changing to snow at times heavy and local blowing snow in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow. High zero. Forecast issued 6:43 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
